name: Into The Light
storyline: In the middle of a storm, a man is involved in a car accident. When he wakes up, he is disoriented and will try to find help at any cost at a nearby gas station. His search for help will take him where no one has ventured before.
summary: In the middle of a storm, a man is involved in a car accident. When he wakes up, he is disoriented and will try to find help at any cost at a nearby gas station. His search for help will take him where no one has ventured before.
